channel.title: Posts on b1ogtank
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on b1ogtank

item.title: TL;DR
item.description: TL;DR here applies to the entire blog site, simply meaning that this post will walk through what this blog site would cover. It’s been a long long time since my first init post in this blog site. Now I have sort of decided what I’m gonna post in my blog (plus what I’m gonna do offline). What I’m gonna post (for everyone to learn) I have been a fan of the one-and-only Scott Hanselman for some time and he shares the same interest in cloud business as I have.

item.title: Init Post
item.description: Finally, I got my first post here, after witnessing Warriors' stunning comebacks against 2 LA championship calibre contenders (today marks the MLK day’s showdown between @StephenCurry30 and @KingJames) and scrapping through a whole bunch of hassles for building this Hugo-powered blog. I have already thought of jotting down that Steph’s quote “You try to just continue to stay humble and stay in the moment. That’s the best way to approach it” after the vintage Warriors' comeback against the Clippers on Jan 8, 2021.
